checkers.server

Class CheckersServerEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • checkers.server.CheckersServerEndpoint

  • public class CheckersServerEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    CheckersServerEndpoint listens for 3 different types of messages and makes decisions based on which one was received
    Author:
    Adebowale Ojetola

      Creates a board message to be sent to the client every time a move is attempted and "valid"(not more than 2 clients allowed) clients ask to play
